content: and pull up a loop yarn over and pull through 2 loops - there will be 2 loops on your hook yarn over and insert your hook into the same stitch/space yarn over and pull up a loop yarn over and pull through 2 loops yarn over and pull through all 3 loops on your hook sisters in stitch/ crochet road the fab5flower square �2 us abbreviations single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet treble_crochet - treble_crochet chain - chain space/s - space/s slip_stitch - slip_stitch round - round repeat - repeat fo - fasten_off st/s - stitch/ stitches skip - skip v-st - v_stitch in this pattern it s an half_double_crochet variation of v_stitch chain-1 space - chain 1 space bp - back post fp - front post rs - right side ws- wrong side increase - increase make 2 stitches in the indicated st or space bl/o - back loop/ only note about blo stitching when working into the blo i also like to work into the back bump aka the third loop the loop behind the v or horizontal bar for a neater appearance this can be a bit tricky if you look behind your back loop on a single_crochet you will see a horizontal bar/ third loop it takes a little practise but minimises gaps in your work if you make your bl stitches into this loop also also when you make your invisible joins into the back loop work into this third loop also for a really polished finish see tatsiana - lilla bjorn s crochet blog for more details if you need them here https //www lillabjorncrochet com/search q=third+loop don t work your stitches in preceding rounds too tightly that way you will find working into the third loops a whole lot easier you can skip working into the third loops if it becomes too difficult and just work into the blo - it will still look great sisters in stitch/ crochet road the fab5flower square �3 instructions firstly make the wonderful fab5flower using kay s @crochetingkay free pattern see kay s written pattern on ravelry https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/the-fab5flower it is also available on lovecrochet on the @sistersinstitch ig feed or you can watch the sisters in stitch youtube video tutorial made by tess @crochetedbytess https //www youtube com/watch v=e0ifssfrkki for this round work under petals with rs facing you round 1 - cream - begin with standing bpsc into fpdc made in round 3 of fab5flower chain 3 bpsc into the third double_crochet of the 5 double_crochet group made in round 2 of fab5flower *chain 3 bpsc repeat from * around slip_stitch into initial bpsc don t fo 10 chain-3-sps 10 bpsc this is a view of the underside of the flower for clarity fold petals forward to work into chain-sps in this round begin round with standing half_double_crochet or chain 2 round 2 - 6 half_double_crochet in each chain-3-space slip_stitch into first half_double_crochet of round don t fo 60
